New Records: Domantas Sabonis achieved a career-high 28 rebounds.
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum recorded 15 points, 12 rebounds, and 5 assists.
Kristaps Porzingis contributed 22 points and 10 rebounds.
The Celtics were outscored 38-21 in the fourth quarter.
The Kings shot 72.7 percent from three in the fourth quarter while the Celtics shot 14.3 percent.
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum emphasized the need for the Celtics to improve in all areas of the game.
Joe Mazzulla highlighted the importance of consistent offense and its impact on defense.
Jaylen Brown stressed the importance of accepting criticism and improving as a unit.
Kristaps Porzingis expressed confidence in the team's ability to bounce back.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics returned home from a 3-1 Western Conference road trip.
Sacramento Kings have won six straight games under interim head coach Doug Christie.
